thread.title: Comment on WATCH: ISIS Executes 4 ‘Spies’ in ‘Al-Furat’, Syria by Haley Cribb
thread.title_full: Comment on WATCH: ISIS Executes 4 ‘Spies’ in ‘Al-Furat’, Syria by Haley Cribb

author: Haley Cribb
title: Comment on WATCH: ISIS Executes 4 ‘Spies’ in ‘Al-Furat’, Syria by Haley Cribb
text:
WATCH: ISIS Executes 4 ‘Spies’ in ‘Al-Furat’, Syria Published Updated 4:29 pm EDT, June 15, 2016 32 Comments By S.J. Prince 16.9k Share Tweet Follow 
A new video purportedly released by the Islamic State shows four men accused of spying against ISIS being executed near the Euphrates River in Syria. The video was released October 29, 2015 and is called “Harvest of the Spies.” It is stated to have been filmed in “Wilayat al-Furat”, an ISIS-occupied area on the Euphrates River that is part of Syria. “Al-Furat” is Arabic for “Euphrates.” 
In the video, four men donning orange jumpsuits are interviewed by ISIS militants in front of a camera. We are currently working to clarify if these men are charged with spying for the pro-Assad regime or other anti-ISIS rebel groups. As always, we cannot independently verify if these men are even spies. 
After being interviewed, the four men are led outside and forced to their knees. ISIS militants take position behind them and shoot them in the head. 
Watch the video above. Viewer discretion is advised.
